 Empire Awards

 Empire Award 
   22nd Empire Awards 
 Awarded for

 First awarded

 Last awarded 
 March 20, 2016  ( 2016-03-20 ) 
 Website 
 2016 Official website 
 The  Empire Awards , is an annual British awards ceremony honoring cinematic achievements in the local and global film industry. Winners are awarded the Empire Award statuette. The awards,  first presented  in 1996, are presented by the British  film magazine   Empire  with the winners voted by the readers of the magazine. 
 The  21st Empire Awards , the most recent ceremony, honoring  films in 2015 , was held on March 20, 2016 [1]  in  London ,  England . [2]  The awards are sponsored by  Jameson Irish Whiskey  since the  14th Empire Awards [3] [4]  and since then are officially called the  Jameson Empire Awards .

 Empire Awards categories [ edit ] 
 Award categories as of 2014 [ edit ] 
 Best Actor : 1996 to present 
 Best Actress : 1996 to present 
 Best Supporting Actor : 2014 
 Best Supporting Actress : 2014 
 Best Director : 1996 to present 
 Best Male Newcomer : 2012 to present 
 Best Female Newcomer : 2012 to present 
 Best Film : 1996 to present 
 Best British Film : 1996 to present; In 2002 it was known as "Sky Movies Best British Film" 
 Best Comedy : 2006 to present 
 Best Horror : 2006 to present 
 Best Sci-Fi/Fantasy : 2006 to present; In 2009 it was known as "Best Sci-Fi/Superhero" 
 Best Thriller : 2006 to present 
 Done In 60 Seconds Award : 2008 to present 
 Retired awards [ edit ] 
 Best British Actor : 1996 to 2005 
 Best British Actress : 1996 to 2005 
 Best British Director : 1997 to 2001; 2005 
 Best Newcomer : 1996 to 2011; From 1996 to 2002 it was known as "Best Debut" 
 Scene of the Year : 2003 to 2007; From 2003 to 2006 it was known as "Sony Ericsson Scene of the Year"; In 2007 it was known as "Scene of the Year" 
 Best Soundtrack : 2008 to 2009; In 2008 it was known as "Sony Ericsson Soundtrack Award"; In 2009 it was known as "Best Soundtrack" 
 The Art of 3D : 2012 to 2013 
 Honorary Empire Awards [ edit ] 
 Current honorary awards [ edit ] 
 As of the  19th Empire Awards  these are the three awards which are currently handed out: 
 Empire Hero Award : 2010 to present 
 Empire Icon Award : 2006; 2008 to 2011; 2014 
 Empire Inspiration Award : 1997; 1999 to 2002; 2004 to 2006; 2008; 2010 to present 
 Retired honorary awards [ edit ] 
 Contribution to Cinema Award : 2000 only 
 Outstanding Contribution to British Cinema Award : 2005 to 2006;  Outstanding Contribution To British Film : 2008 to 2010;  Outstanding Contribution : 2013 only 
 Independent Spirit Award : 2002 to 2005 
 Lifetime Achievement Award : 1996 to 2003; 2006;  Career Achievement Award : 2004 only 
 Movie Masterpiece Award : 1999 to 2000 
 Legend Award:  2012 to 2013 
 Empire Special Honorary Awards [ edit ] 
 Actor Of Our Lifetime : 2009 only 
 Action Hero of Our Lifetime : 2014 only 
 Legend of Our Lifetime : 2014 only 
 Icon of the Decade : 2005 only 
 Heath Ledger Tribute : 2009 only

 ^   Ojomu, Nola; Leyfield, James (March 30, 2014).  "Tom Cruise cuts a dapper figure in an immaculate navy suit as he is named Legend Of Our Lifetime at the 2014 Empire Film awards" .  Mail Online .  Associated Newspapers Ltd . Retrieved  April 1,  2014 .   
 ^   "Jameson Empire Awards 2009 - Nominations"  (Press release).  Bauer Consumer Media . March 2, 2009. Archived from  the original  on May 8, 2009.   
 ^   Turney, Ewan (December 1, 2008).  "Jameson to sponsor Empire Awards" .  Morningadvertiser.co.uk .  William Reed Business Media . Archived from  the original  on October 1, 2014 . Retrieved  October 1,  2014 .
